abstract: A Chinese businessman mentioned a Chinese company ahead of a meeting with Warren Buffett, and watched the shares soar.
snippet: A Chinese businessman mentioned a Chinese company ahead of a meeting with Warren Buffett, and watched the shares soar.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI  A Chinese businessman named Zhao Danyang paid a record $2.1 million in a charity auction on eBay last year to win a lunch date with one of his heroes: Warren E. Buffett, the so-called Oracle of Omaha.

headline.main: Winner of Lunch With Warren Buffett Gets a Windfall
headline.print_headline: Steak and Seafood, With a $14 Million Dessert
